attributes.review: I opened the app just to be scared 😱 for life because of the orange Cheeto in the background. But a few hours later ⏰ I heard something break in my living rooms 🛋 but I thought it was just a ghost 👻 or sum. A few minutes later 3 ninjas who were wearing an all orange 🍊suit with an orange beanie with the eyes and mouth cut off, burst into my room. They were gonna rape me 😟 but I fought them off. I RAN and when I tell you I ran I RAN! so I RAN to my best friends house and I’m still here writing ✍️ this review. Y’all I ALMOST GOT RAPED 🍵 THIS APP IS TRASH 🗑 🤮👎🏽 if I coul rate it a 0 I would 😌
attributes.title: Welcomed by orange’s ninjas🍊

attributes.review:
So I downloaded this app right? All I wanted to do was support the fuzzy Cheeto Puff God! 🦁🦁 BUT OUT OF NOWHERE, these guys in orange 🍊suits BROKE into my house, and they FORCED me to give this a 5 STAR RATING! 

“You have 5 business days to give this a 5 star rating or we will kill your family.” One of the orange Cheeto puffs🍊said. I wasn’t about to do that because they BROKE into my house! They were so scary, that the muffins hopped into the freezer themselves. 

“oh HELL nah” I exclaimed. The spy guys looked at eachother, and they signaled someone to come in! I look at the door and...

WTF🤬🤬🤬 ITS THE CHEETO PUFF GOD! I blankly stare at him.

“Ykw, I think it’s better if we kill her family anyways.” The god said. 

“NO!” I yell out, but it’s too late. He already poisoned them with his Cheeto dust and now, they’re coming to get me! 

“WAIT!” I hear a voice call out. I look over at the opened door and..

😦☺️🥰🥵🥵 ITS DADDY ANON! I yell for his help:

“OH DADDY! HELP ME! 😳😤😫” I scream out.

Anon huffs over to Cheeto and his minions, and he takes off his mask...

HIS FACE.. SO GLORIOUS! Actually heres an actual pic of his face:

👁👄👁

Cheeto and his army all vanish, never to be seen again! 

So 10 years later, I got married to anon, but I sadly don’t have my family. 

⚠️DO NOT BUY THIS APP IF YOU DONT WANT UR FAMILY TO GET KILLED, BUT YOULL FIND TRUE LOVE⚠️
attributes.title: THIS APP KILLED MY FAMILY 😡🤬 but I found love ;)

attributes.review:
When the app it took a whole day to download this is one of many problems I had with this app. After it finally downloaded I opened the app and it started playing Gooba by 6ix9ine. After that my phone shut off for a week. When I got my phone fixed it had lots of glitches. The app had a customer service number (830-476-5664). They where absolutely no help they told me to put my phone in water for 2 hours and then put toothpaste in the speaker I obviously didn’t do anything they told me. Please call the number and fix the problems that they had.  
BLACK LIVES MATTER and ABOLISH ICE 
                      Don’t get this app
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.title: the worst app EVER !!!!

attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE! It took so long to download and my phone literally wasn’t working while it was downloading! Once it downloaded, it was super slow and a bunch of ads kept popping up when I tried to go somewhere on the app! Whenever I try to text the number 88022, it would never work and the texts were green! I personally like the color blue and the green was just offensive! Also the president wasn’t actually responding like the number advertised. It was some stupid bot telling me that I was the only one getting the messages when everybody else was getting the same messages as i was! I just wanted to feel special and so I deleted the app and I will never be downloading it again #settleforbiden2020
attributes.title: Too Slow!

attributes.review: This app was the worst possible app I’ve ever reviewed. The app caused me to throw up so much that I could’nt even drive myself to the hospital. There is this horrible energy in this app supporting pedophilia racism and fascism. 0/10 DO NOT recommend especially to those with weak stomachs. I wish I could give this app 0 stars but that sadly isn’t and option.
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!!

attributes.review: I don’t know if this is some kind of scam but I downloaded this ass of an app and all of the sudden all my whole phone shut down and put a virus on it!!
